alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 10:33PM CST until January 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Custer County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
